title: Russian language turning into crap with vnc connection
author: KKostikov
body_snippet:
Hello.
Russian lletters turning into crap over vnc protocol connection from win10 to win10 (at least).
RDP protocol connection works fine
English language works fine

RNG ver. 1.76.11.40527
Windows 10 Pro (any build)

comments.snippet: Thanks for reporting this @KKostikov. Could you provide a screen shot of what you are seeing? This will help us when trying to reproduce the issue.
comments.author: sparerd

comments.snippet:
Sorry i forgot to mention, we use TightVNC server for Windows ver. 2.8.11 as the server part. We chose this one because it has an msi package for mass deployment in AD structure.  Heres screenshot
![mremoteng](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36406800/50326616-5c667900-04fc-11e9-9f2a-a3f7a3c7f970.png)
comments.author: KKostikov

comments.snippet: Thanks @KKostikov. Does this happen immediately after connecting, or does it work fine for a while and then start showing those odd characters?
comments.author: sparerd

comments.snippet:
Immediately when we switch to Russian language.

comments.snippet:
I approved that bug with TightVNC server (last version).
Use UltraVNC server.

comments.snippet:

comments.author: nagorsky

comments.snippet: Yes, on 1.76.20.24615 and TightVNC russian language turning into crap...

comments.snippet: will check possibly issue on TightVNC side by need verification
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet: I am able to reproduce such, will think how we can fix that - problem is that keypress don't send valid key code for some reason
comments.author: Kvarkas
